text: davudare, navu khandita nim'mannu bhumiyalli (nam'ma) pratinidhiyagisiruvevu. Nivu janara naduve n'yayocitavagi tirmana kaigolliri mattu sveccheyannu anusarisabedi. Adu nim'mannu allahana margadinda duragolisi biduvudu. Allahana margadinda dura saridu bittavarige, avaru vicaraneya dinavannu maretudakkagi khandita, tivra sikse ide
